introduction_english: What we'll explore next is the term つきあい, which you often encounter in social settings, especially during events or gatherings where maintaining social relations is key.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "tsukiai" means "socializing" or "relationships". It refers to the act of associating with others, especially in a social or work-related setting. This term can imply interactions and obligations, often focusing on the effort to maintain good relationships within one's circle or community.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 交際 : こうさい : company
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word つきあい is こうさい, which also refers to social interactions and socialization. However, 交際 prevails more in romantic or close relationships, whereas つきあい has a broader, sometimes formal context.
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word つきあい is むし, meaning "disregard" or "ignore". While つきあい signifies active engagement in social interactions, むし denotes avoiding or ignoring such interactions.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は付き合いがいいです。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は付き合(つきあ)いがいいです。

translations.MY: သူသည် လူထုပေါင်းသင်းရန် အဆင်ပြေသည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 彼女は付き合いが悪い。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)は付き合(つきあ)いが悪(わる)い。

translations.VI: Cô ấy không thích giao tiếp xã hội.
translations.MY: သူမသည် လူမှုရေးဆက်ဆံမှု အဆင်မပြေတာဖြစ်သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 彼とは付き合いをたった。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)とは付き合い(つきあい)をたった。

translations.VI: Tôi đã cắt đứt quan hệ với anh ấy.
translations.FR: J'ai coupé les liens avec lui.
translations.BN: আমি তার সঙ্গে সম্পর্ক ছিন্ন করলাম।
translations.TL: Pinuputol ko na ang pakikipag-ugnayan sa kanya.
translations.MY: သူနဲ့ဆက်ဆံရေးကိုဖြတ်လိုက်တယ်။
translations.HI: मैंने उसके साथ संबंध तोड़ दिए।
translations.FA: ارتباطم را با او قطع کردم.

example_sentences.kanji: 友達に無理につきあうのはやめよう。
example_sentences.furigana: 友達(ともだち)に無理(むり)につきあうのはやめよう。

translations.EN: Let's stop forcing ourselves to hang out with friends.
translations.ID: Mari kita berhenti memaksakan diri untuk berkumpul dengan teman-teman.
translations.ES: Dejemos de obligarnos a salir con amigos.
translations.VI: Hãy dừng ép buộc bản thân phải ở bên bạn bè.
translations.FR: Arrêtons de nous forcer à sortir avec des amis.
translations.NE: साथीसँग नदिच्चित रुपमा घुम्न बन्द गरौं।
translations.BN: বন্ধুদের সঙ্গে জোরপূর্বক মেলামেশা বন্ধ করা যাক।
translations.ZH: 让我们停止强迫自己和朋友聚会。
translations.TL: Tigilan na natin ang pagpilit sa sarili na makipagkita sa mga kaibigan.
translations.MY: သူငယ်ချင်းတွေနဲ့ အဖွဲ့သွားဖို့ အတင်းအကျဲကြိုးစားတာရပ်ကြပါစို့။
translations.HI: दोस्तों के साथ जबरन मिलना बंद करें।
translations.AR: دعونا نتوقف عن إجبار أنفسنا على الترفيه عن الأصدقاء.
translations.FA: بیایید مجبور کردن خودمان برای معاشرت با دوستان را متوقف کنیم.

association.MY: အသင်းအဖွဲ့
